A

Async - Interface in com.j2speed.async
An asynchronous computation that can be executed on a specified AsyncRunner.
AsyncCompletion - Class in com.j2speed.async
A compound class that provide both the definition of the computation and the handling of its completion.
AsyncCompletion() - Constructor for class com.j2speed.async.AsyncCompletion
 
AsyncExecutor - Interface in com.j2speed.async
The Executor specialisation for use in and AsyncRunner.
AsyncLoop<T> - Class in com.j2speed.async
A loop based Progressive that executes until the execution is cancelled or the loop has no more available iterations.
AsyncLoop() - Constructor for class com.j2speed.async.AsyncLoop
 
AsyncProgress<T> - Class in com.j2speed.async
A compound class that provide both the definition of the computation and the handling of its progress.
AsyncProgress() - Constructor for class com.j2speed.async.AsyncProgress
 
AsyncResponse<T> - Class in com.j2speed.async
A compound class that provide both the definition of the computation and the handling of its response.
AsyncResponse() - Constructor for class com.j2speed.async.AsyncResponse
 
AsyncRun - Interface in com.j2speed.async
Represents the current execution life cycle of an asynchronous computation.
AsyncRunner - Interface in com.j2speed.async
A runner for asynchronous operations.

D

DefaultRunner - Class in com.j2speed.async
An AsyncRunner that uses a bound number of maximum threads.

Constructor of the class.
DefaultRunner(int, String) - Constructor for class com.j2speed.async.DefaultRunner

execute(Runnable) - Method in class com.j2speed.async.ReentrantExecutor
Executes the task in the current thread if the current thread is one owned by the executor, otherwise the command is scheduled it to be executed in the executor normally.

P

Progress<T> - Interface in com.j2speed.async

ProgressHandler<T> - Interface in com.j2speed.async
It handles the values received during the execution of an asynchronous Progressive.
Progressive<T> - Interface in com.j2speed.async
A request that can produce multiple instances of the specified type and we want the ability to process each one whenever it is ready.
ProgressState<T> - Interface in com.j2speed.async
Notifies a progress handler of a progress.

RunOn - Annotation Type in com.j2speed.async
Annotation to mark a method that needs to be invoked on a specific thread (or pool of threads).

Allows the execution of an asynchronous computation to query the running status.
SyncRunner - Class in com.j2speed.async
An "asynchronous" runner that uses the calling thread to execute the asyncs.

T

transfer(Runnable) - Static method in class com.j2speed.async.Edt
This method satisfies the contract specified by the RunOn annotation.
